customerrors.name: Custom Errors
customerrors.description: Small plugin to track bot errors. Can be used by the bot owner.

stats.name: Stats
stats.description: Plugin to track server stats. Only available for one server. Stats will be written in an excel file.
stats.guild_id: the server id where the bot should look for stats.

announce.name: Custom Announce
announce.description: A small plugin for custom announce.

ownermessage.name: Owner Message
ownermessage.description: Very small plugin to receive a dm from the bot when it is added to a server.

support.name: Bot Support
support.description: Plugin for the documentation and the bot website...
